title: Build and Run a SOQL Query
overview:
Build and run a complex SOQL query against Case using the Query component. Resulting SOQL:

SELECT CaseNumber, Subject, Type, Priority, Origin, Status, LastModifiedDate,
       Account.Name, Contact.Name,
       TYPEOF Owner WHEN User THEN Name ELSE Name END
FROM Case
WHERE IsClosed = FALSE
  AND (Status IN ('Escalated','On Hold') OR Priority = 'High')
  AND LastModifiedDate < LAST_WEEK
  AND AccountId != null
ORDER BY Priority ASC NULLS LAST
generalUseCase: Build and run SOQL queries the easiest way with schema-aware suggestions—no syntax required. DSP’s Query runs natively in Salesforce as an LWC, so you can query and preview without leaving Salesforce, maintaining enterprise-grade security. It seamlessly integrates with Lightning Experience—embed on record and app pages to power flexible, high-performance queries wherever you work.
